original_text: For an angel went down at a certain season into the pool, and troubled the water: whosoever then first after the troubling of the water stepped in was made whole of whatsoever disease he had.
korean_text: 이는 천사가 가끔 못에 내려와 물을 움직이게 하는데 움직인 후에 먼저 들어가는 자는 어떤 병에 걸렸든지 낫게 됨이러라]

sentences.original_text: For an angel went down at a certain season into the pool
sentences.korean_translation: 한 천사가 때가 되어 연못에 내려왔으니

sentences.original_text: whosoever then first after the troubling of water stepped in
sentences.korean_translation: 물이 동요한 후에 먼저 들어간 자는

sentences.original_text: was made whole of whatsoever disease he had
